level.heading: Rating organization.
level.text: A captive insurer shall not required to join a rating organization.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 31-3932.03.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 19 of Captive Insurance Company Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-640, November 30, 2004, 52 DCR 1238).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-262
level.text: For Law 15-262, see notes following ยง 31-3931.01.
